61801.summary: Some customers in Stonewall are experiencing an interruption to Internet services. We are working to restore service as quickly as possible and apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.
61801.title: June 1 - Stonewall | Internet Services - Outage (Resolved)

live_updates: Our teams are looking into it. Please stay tuned for updates. A further update will be provided at 13:02 MT.
61804.summary: Some customers in the Sunnyside area of Calgary are experiencing an interruption to Internet, Television and Home Phone services. We are working to restore service as quickly as possible and apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.
61804.title: June 1 - Calgary (Sunnyside) | All Services - Outage (Fix In Progress)
